result.eng: Nobody spoke, even the children had solemn expressions.
result.ga: Níor labhair aon duine fiú na páistí beaga bhí dreach sollúnta orthu
result.orig: Níor labhair aon duine fiú na páistí beaga bhí dreach sollúnta orthu
result.html: Níor labhair aon duine fiú na páistí beaga bhí dreach sollúnta orthuNobody spoke, even the children had solemn expressions.
result.ponchtml: Níor laḃair aon duine fiú na páistí beaga ḃí dreaċ sollúnta orṫuNobody spoke, even the children had solemn expressions.

result.eng: That doesn't happen as often now as it used to a few years ago.
result.ga: Ní thiteann sin amach chomh minic anois agus a thitfeadh blianta beaga ó shin
result.orig: Ní thiteann sin amach chomh minic anois agus a thitfeadh blianta beaga ó shin
result.html: Ní thiteann sin amach chomh minic anois agus a thitfeadh blianta beaga ó shinThat doesn't happen as often now as it used to a few years ago.
result.ponchtml: Ní ṫiteann sin amaċ ċoṁ minic anois agus a ṫitfeaḋ blianta beaga ó ẛinThat doesn't happen as often now as it used to a few years ago.

result.eng: The words came out of her mouth as small clouds of steam.
result.ga: Tháinig na focail amach as a béal ina néalta beaga gaile
result.orig: Tháinig na focail amach as a béal ina néalta beaga gaile
result.html: Tháinig na focail amach as a béal ina néalta beaga gaileThe words came out of her mouth as small clouds of steam.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig na focail amaċ as a béal ina néalta beaga gaileThe words came out of her mouth as small clouds of steam.

result.eng: But him playing with little boats, at his age!
result.ga: Ach eisean ag cur bádaí beaga ar snámh san aois a bhfuil sé ann
result.orig: Ach eisean ag cur bádaí beaga ar snámh san aois a bhfuil sé ann
result.html: Ach eisean ag cur bádaí beaga ar snámh san aois a bhfuil sé annBut him playing with little boats, at his age!
result.ponchtml: Aċ eisean ag cur bádaí beaga ar snáṁ san aois a ḃfuil sé annBut him playing with little boats, at his age!
